data.title: Greg Wolf on LinkedIn: Block Party
data.meta_description: To ANYONE in the professional sports world who wants to hear from an absolute LEGEND in the industry, please take the time to watch our latest episode of the‚Ä¶ | 13 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
üí• It was great to speak with Sports Business Journal and Joe Lemire around the evolution of Grabyo's #cloudproduction platform, and capabilities in #livesports. The commercial pressure in the #media industry is more acute than ever, as we transition from #cable & #satellite delivery, to IP-based #ott & #FAST. In comparison to traditional hardware systems, Grabyo's platform: üí∞ reduces production costs while increasing advertising revenue üñ• simplifies content creation while maximizing distribution (social/digital/broadcast) üå≥ drives sustainable policies while maintaining high quality broadcasts We explored a few case studies with Ultimate Fighting Championship, National Lacrosse League (NLL), and the Arizona Cardinals Football Club. üôè Thanks to David Shaw, Joel Feld, and TIM DELANEY for their support....and to Amazon Web Services (AWS). #broadcasting #streaming #videoproduction #teamgrabyo

üí• TACTALYSE LIVE WEBINAR üí• Do you want to learn how we work with players from the Premier League, Serie A, Bundesliga, La Liga and many more top competitions? Then you should sign up for our Live Webinar about our Basic Methodology üëá https://lnkd.in/gws-kMjN The Live Webinar about our Basic Methodology is designed for you to get insight into a unique football methodology. Get inspired and learn to understand a new way of watching football. In this Live Webinar, Loran Vrielink, the owner of Tactalyse, will guide you through all the key topics and aspects of the basics of our Methodology. The session will include instructive videos, animations, and interactive discussions to enhance your understanding of the subject. During this Live webinar, you will learn the following: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Get a better understanding of the definition of (football) tactics. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Insight into what team tactics entail. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Understanding of constellations inside a team. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Increase your knowledge about individual tactics.

LAST WEEK OF THE EARLY BIRD TICKETS! Dive into the world of Individual Tactics in our upcoming Live Webinar! Explore the three steps that make individual tactics truly impactful. Be inspired by the methodology we successfully use in coaching players from top football leagues like the Premier League, Serie A, Bundesliga, La Liga, and national teams. In this Live Webinar, Loran Vrielink, the owner of Tactalyse, will guide you through all the key topics and aspects of individual football tactics. The session will include instructive videos, animations, and interactive discussions to enhance your understanding of the subject. Throughout this Live Webinar, you will acquire knowledge on the following: Gain a better understanding of what Individual Tactics entail. Gain insight into the three steps of Individual Tactics (Perception, Decision, and Execution). Understand how to recognize these three steps in a specific game situation. https://lnkd.in/eJrrwJMz

Last episode we will be doing for awhile! As the NFL Kickoff draws near Draft season is in Full effect.. For our season finale we breakdown our League of Legends Rookie draft with some of favorite picks through the draft. Like & Subscribe for more content!

Game Day Saturday: The importance of getting your assistants involved. Make sure to review with your assistants the starting lineup, defensive match-ups, substitution patterns, and any special strategies for the game. Make sure that they are as well prepared as your players. #getbetter

Some would say, Juri Bilcich is a walking sports encyclopedia. With a deep passion for all things sports, he is currently a weekly NBA and AFL panellist for Mojo Sports network and Zero Digital Sports, and has recently started a role with Seven West Media, reporting on the WAFL. Juri joins John-Paul on this episode of Talk All Things.
